lstDialogOne: I've been fortunate enough to be asigned the task of being your new psychic!
For a few human souls, I can predict your future
lstOutcomeYesText: Perfect, I just love the bitter-sweet taste of royal desolute souls
Never has there been such a luxury, such a delicacy!
All good, you live a long and happy life
lstOutcomeNoText: What?! Not even one pityless soul?
Don't you care about your future?
